titleStmt.title: A coppy of a letter sent by the burga-masters and Councel of Amsterdam to the rest of the city's that have their session in the Assembly of the States of Holland and West-Frezland
titleStmt.author: Amsterdam (Netherlands). Raad.
Friesland (Netherlands). Provinciale Staten.
Holland (Netherlands : Province). Staten.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Rotterdam ... by Peter Martin, and reprinted in London by J. Millet,

notesStmt.note: On a dispute as to the conduct of the deputies from Amsterdam in the States-Provincial.
